requirements.question: Watch an anime with the format “TV” and the tag “Primarily Male Cast”
Watch an anime from our "Cute Boys Doing Cute Things" community list
Boys Being Boys: Watch an anime with the tag “Boys' Love”, “Reverse Harem” or “Shounen”
Watch an anime featuring one of your favourite male voice actors
Watch an anime with the tag “Male Protagonist” and the genre “Slice of Life”, “Sports” or “Romance”
Demon Boys: Watch an anime with a male main character that is not human
Secret Boy: Watch an anime featuring one of another participant’s favourite male characters that has 500 favourites or less
Watch an anime with a topless male character OR an anime with a “kabedon” scene
Watch an anime that has the letters “C, U, T, E” or “B, O, Y, S” in the title
Watch an anime that features another participant’s cute boy
